product_name: Mountain N' Air Books Guide to Wild Foods and Useful Plants - 2nd Edition
long_description: A guide for anybody interested in safely foraging in the outdoors, the updated edition of Guide to Wild Foods and Useful Plants offers detailed information on over 70 plants.
